tree.colors: blue:state in ('draft');grey:state in ('cancel');brown:print_status in ('printed');red:state not in ('cancel', 'done') and date < current_date

record.field: This is the list of all delivery orders that have to be prepared, according to your different sales orders and your logistics rules.

tree.colors: black:invoice_state in ('invoiced') ; blue:invoice_state in ('2binvoiced');red:invoice_state not in ('cancel', 'invoiced') and date < current_date
